messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of star vampires know 1D3 spells?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for a star vampire?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the number of attacks a star vampire can make per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the move speed of a star vampire when flying?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the initial HP of a star vampire?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average number of magic points for a star vampire?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a living victim who is bitten by a star vampire?
The victim loses 3D10 STR per round, as blood loss.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage to the extra-terrestrial integument of the star vampire's victims when hit with bullets?
Bullets do only half damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by a star vampire's attack?
3D10 STR blood drain per round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the armor rating of the star vampire?
4-point hide.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by the star vampire's sword?
1D6 + damage bonus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the attackers are seized by the star vampire?
The attackers can be bitten in the following round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage done to a star vampire if it's hit by bullets?
Half damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage done to a target bitten by a star vampire?
3D10 STR blood drain
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the dodge chance for a star vampire's attack?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the armor of a star vampire?
4-point hide
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much sanity points are lost to see a star vampire or experience its attack?
1/1D10 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the origin of the tcho-tcho race?
Hybrid race formed from humans intermingled with the horrible Miri
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the origin of the tcho-tchos according to the text?
The tcho-tchos are said to come from humans who intermingled with the horrible Miri, forming a hybrid race of evil intent.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the sanity of tcho-tchos at birth?
The taint of the Miri curses all tcho-tchos with Half-normal sanity at birth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How quickly does the remaining sanity of tcho-tchos erode?
The remaining sanity of the tcho-tchos is rapidly eroded in a few years by participation in unspeakable ceremonies and horrific deeds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a common characteristic of tcho-tcho tribes?
Differing tcho-tcho tribes worship a variety of Great Old Ones, not just Chaugnar Faugn.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a typical spell known by a Tcho-Tcho priest or acolyte?
A Tcho-Tcho priest or acolyte knows at least three spells, usually including a Contact Deity spell and the Voor-ish Sign.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of tcho-tcho worship?
Tcho-tcho worship is characterized as cruel, savage, and dark god-worshiping.
